These principles not only underlie the breakthrough performance of convolutional neural networks and the recent success of graph neural networks but also provide a principled way to construct new types of problem-specific inductive biases.","markups":[{"type":2,"start":0,"end":385}]},{"name":"93f7","type":1,"text":"This blog post was co-authored with Joan Bruna, Taco Cohen, and Petar Veličković and is based on the new “proto-book” M.
